answers.answer: It could be a sign of anemia. Has your Dr checked your blood for any deficiencies?
I'm going in the morning to have the test done for gestational diabetes and they are supposed to check for anemia too.
It's normal to crave ice while pregnant.. I've craved ice all three pregnancies one worst than the others but it is totally normal.. No anemia here
I have anemia and I crave ice like crazy
I crave ice and have done with all 4 pregnancies. Never been anaemic. Was so excited to find my supermarket now sells crushed ice! I normally avoid ice cos it hurts my teeth :)
I have anemia but i dont crave ice.
I have anemia but i dont crave ice.
I'm 24 weeks and I'm 38 years old carrying my first child. I am itching alot. Is this normal. Especially when I get out the shower. Im using the same soap.

question: Is it normal that I always want ice. I am always eating it and I never use to before I was pregnant. Also I have really been craving snow cones
title: ice
